person.persName: John Ellis (Kenton co State Rep & farmer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, native. Moved to Kenton County in 1836. Taught school in Kenton County. Married Mary H. Carlisle Ellis on August 15, 1839. Member of the Christian Church (Disciples of Christ) since 1845. Represented Kenton County in the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky as a Democrat from 1857 to 1861. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860. Common schools commissioner in Kenton County. Member of the Masons.
